contents.text: To book a tour, please use our online booking form or you can call us on the numbers given at Contact page.
The following details are required for booking with us:
Number of Adults and Children for the Tour.
Date you wish to book for
Deposit only is required to secure your booking and is payable via PayPal. Once deposit is made a confirmation email will be sent along with your approximate pick up time and any joining guidelines.
Remaining balance will need to be paid on the day to the driver/guide upon pick up for your tour.
It is wise to make your booking at least two days in advance to make sure there is availability.
Trackers Excursions is not responsible for unforeseen accidental delays on pick up, drop off or duration of tour.

Trackers Excursions will not be held liable for any injury. Participants are responsible for their own actions during the tour and must follow the safety instructions and advice given by the guide or driver or captain/crew of the boat.

Trackers Excursions will not be held liable for loss or damage of any personal belongings brought with you on tour. e.g., coats, bags, cameras, souvenirs etc. Do not leave any valuables unattended in the vehicle at any time.

Itineraries operate subject to weather conditions. Trackers Excursions reserves the right to alter arrangements or cancel the operation of a scheduled tour should conditions necessitate without prior notice. The time spent in each stop and return times are approximate estimates and could also change without prior notice. It also reserves the right to decline to accept or retain any person as a member of any tour at any time, in which case an equitable amount will be refunded.

Food and drinks are not included in the price unless specified in the tour description. ​Trackers Excursions has carefully selected the restaurants and refreshment suppliers for each tour to be able to cater with a variety of options and dietary requirements. Trackers excursions will not be held liable for any issues arising from any food or refreshments purchased throughout the tour.
Any food allergies or dietary requirements should be communicated with guide/driver to be able to assist with selections.
Some tours have free samples or tastings; this does not oblige you to make a purchase, only at your free will.
Trackers Excursions pleas to respect religious sites by covering legs and arms prior to entering.
The company reserves the right to employ subcontractors for all or part of the services.
Cancellation fees will apply if cancellation is less than 24 hour notification.
The use of this website is subject to the following terms of use:
The content of the pages of this website is for your general information and use only. It is subject to change without notice.

Neither we nor any third parties provide any warranty or guarantee as to the accuracy, timeliness, performance, completeness or suitability of the information and materials found or offered on this website for any particular purpose. You acknowledge that such information and materials may contain inaccuracies or errors and we expressly exclude liability for any such inaccuracies or errors to the fullest extent permitted by law.

Your use of any information or materials on this website is entirely at your own risk, for which we shall not be liable. It shall be your own responsibility to ensure that any products, services or information available through this website meet your specific requirements.

This website contains material which is owned by or licensed to us. This material includes, but is not limited to, the design, layout, look, appearance, photos and graphics. Reproduction is prohibited other than in accordance with the copyright notice, which forms part of these terms and conditions.
Unauthorised use of this website may give rise to a claim for damages and/or be a criminal offence.

This website include links to other websites. These links are provided for your convenience to provide further information. They do not signify that we endorse the website(s). We have no responsibility for the content of the linked website(s).
You may not create a link to this website from another website or document without Trackers Excursions prior written consent.
Your use of this website and any dispute arising out of such use of the website is subject to the laws of Cyprus or other regulatory authority.
